text: Ani tumhi tyanna bahera kadhu naka, je sakala-sandhyakala apalya palanakartyaci upasana karatata, visesatah tyaci marji prapta karu icchitata, tyancya hisobasi tumaca kincitahi sambandha nahi ani tumacya hisobasi tyanca kincitahi sambandha nahi ki jyamule tumhi tyanna bahera ghalavave, kimbahuna tumhi atyacara karanaryampaiki tharala
